contextId.information: AT: "I will place a crown in my temple" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: A crown will be placed in the temple of Yahweh

contextId.information: AT: "when the foundation of my temple was set in place" to "when you were building the foundation of my house" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: when the foundation of my house was laid

contextId.information: AT: "your enemies will take all of your possessions and divide it for themselves while you watch" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: your plunder will be divided in your midst

contextId.information: AT: "your enemies will allow the remaining people to stay in the city" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: the remainder of the people will not be cut off from the city
